Sentencas: A novel concept of ceramic or solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) based on non-ceria-salt-composites electrolyte has been investigated.
Titulo: Novel ceramic fuel cell using non-ceria-based composites as electrolyte

Sentencas: The fuel cell using LiAlO2-carbonate (LiNaCO3) as electrolyte exhibits excellent performances, when we used hydrogen and air as fuel and oxidant respectively, instead of molten carbonate fuel cells (MCFCs) environment.
Titulo: Novel ceramic fuel cell using non-ceria-based composites as electrolyte

Sentencas: The maximum output power density can reach 466 mW/cm(2) at 650 degrees C and the discharging current keeps constant.
Titulo: Novel ceramic fuel cell using non-ceria-based composites as electrolyte

Sentencas: The ion transport mechanics of the ceramic fuel cell were discussed.
Titulo: Novel ceramic fuel cell using non-ceria-based composites as electrolyte

Sentencas: In the H-2/air atmosphere, the new fuel cell function should be performed only by proton or oxygen ion conduction, which differs essentially from the MCFC function, in which the CO32- conduction dominates process.
Titulo: Novel ceramic fuel cell using non-ceria-based composites as electrolyte
Novel ceramic fuel cell using non-ceria-based composites as electrolyte
